headline: Corning (GLW) Net Margin Soars to 9.2%, Challenging Concerns Over High Valuation
summary: Corning (GLW) posted a dramatic turnaround in its bottom line this year, with net profit margin jumping to 9.2% from just 1.2% the prior year, and earnings surging 775.6% after five years of average annual declines of 5.4%. Looking ahead, revenue is expected to grow 12.4% per year and earnings at 23.1% per year, both outpacing broader US market averages. Investors now face the pivotal question of whether this strong rebound and bullish growth outlook can justify the stock's premium price...

headline: All You Need to Know About Corning (GLW) Rating Upgrade to Strong Buy
summary: Corning (GLW) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

headline: All Weather Group and Corning Forge Path Toward the Future of Window Performance
summary: Exclusive collaboration introduces quad-pane potential and next-generation energy efficiency to CanadaEdmonton, AB, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- All Weather Group (AWG), a Canadian leader in window and door solutions, today announced an exclusive collaboration with Corning Incorporated (NYSE: GLW), one of the world’s leading innovators in glass, ceramics, and materials science, to bring thin quadruple-pane window units featuring Corning® Enlighten™ Glass to the Canadian market. headline: Potentially 12%-15% Consistent Income: Monthly Options Series (Nov. 2025)
